title: Inquiry-Based Learning Design Utilizing Science Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: General Understanding of Basic Science Concepts and Storytelling
context.additional_context: Learners possess beginner-level expertise in the language domain and participate in blended learning using personal devices (BYOD). Combines online (offline activity design) and offline (practical workshop) sessions

learning_goals: Learners can analyze stories containing scientific topics to derive core scientific concepts.
Learners can design inquiry-based scenarios and propose improvements incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can implement story-based inquiry activities using digital tools (apps/webs) and upload them to a shared platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
